mapper.sql: id, psn_code, current_month, consume_date, item, money, profit_loss_sort, pay_mode, pay_money, incom_mode, incom_money, create_date, tag_status, current_year
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from fund_change
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into fund_change (id, psn_code, current_month, consume_date, item, money, profit_loss_sort, pay_mode, pay_money, incom_mode, incom_money, create_date, tag_status, current_year) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{psnCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consumeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{profitLossSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{incomMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tagStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{currentYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update fund_change
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
psn_code = #{record.psnCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
current_month = #{record.currentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consume_date = #{record.consumeDate,jdbcType=DATE},
item = #{record.item,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{record.money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
profit_loss_sort = #{record.profitLossSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_mode = #{record.payMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_money = #{record.payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
incom_mode = #{record.incomMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
incom_money = #{record.incomMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tag_status = #{record.tagStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
current_year = #{record.currentYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update fund_change set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, psn_code = #{record.psnCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_month = #{record.currentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consume_date = #{record.consumeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, item = #{record.item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{record.money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, profit_loss_sort = #{record.profitLossSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_mode = #{record.payMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_money = #{record.payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, incom_mode = #{record.incomMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, incom_money = #{record.incomMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tag_status = #{record.tagStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, current_year = #{record.currentYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update fund_change
psn_code = #{psnCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
current_month = #{currentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consume_date = #{consumeDate,jdbcType=DATE},
item = #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
profit_loss_sort = #{profitLossSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_mode = #{payMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_money = #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
incom_mode = #{incomMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
incom_money = #{incomMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tag_status = #{tagStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
current_year = #{currentYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fund_change set psn_code = #{psnCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_month = #{currentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consume_date = #{consumeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, item = #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, profit_loss_sort = #{profitLossSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_mode = #{payMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_money = #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, incom_mode = #{incomMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, incom_money = #{incomMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tag_status = #{tagStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, current_year = #{currentYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT fc.id, fc.psn_code, fc.current_month, fc.consume_date, fc.item, fc.money, fc.profit_loss_sort, fc.pay_mode, fc.pay_money, fc.incom_mode, fc.incom_money, fc.create_date, fc.tag_status, fc.current_year, cd.zh_cn_caption AS profit_loss_sort_name , cd2.zh_cn_caption AS pay_mode_name, cd3.zh_cn_caption AS incom_mode_name FROM fund_change fc INNER JOIN const_dictionary cd ON fc.profit_loss_sort = cd.cost_code INNER JOIN const_dictionary cd2 ON fc.pay_mode = cd2.cost_code INNER JOIN const_dictionary cd3 ON fc.incom_mode = cd3.cost_code WHERE fc.psn_code = #{psnCode} AND fc.current_year = #{currentYear} AND fc.current_month=#{currentMonth}
